text: (Yakuba) mhanale, mi tara tyala tumacyasobata kadhihi pathavinara nahi, joparyanta tumhi allahala madhyasthi thevuna mala vacana dyala ki tumhi tyala majhyajavala pocavala, yakherija ki tumhi sarva kaidi banavile jala. Jevha tyanni pakke vacana dile tevha te mhanale ki amhi je kahi bolata ahota, allaha tyaca sanraksaka ahe
